resources.string:
Being a native of the Russian capital of mining - Irkutsk, it was impossible not to notice the mining hype that swept the city in 2021, let alone try it yourself.

Since then, the idea and even lack of such a tool as a profitability calculator started up. Therefore, I present to you the application of my development.

Leaving a bad or good review in the Play Market you motivate me to keep developing this app, and also send your ideas and suggestions by mail, you have a great chance to contribute to the development of this project.
